title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader, 
Minister for the Environment, Climate and Communications and Minister for 
Transport) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister environment climate communication minister transport) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader,
heading: 2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address have
text_raw:
2. Each of the following persons particulars of each of whose address have 
been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is the leader of a 
political party registered in the Register of Political Parties, Minister for the 
Environment, Climate and Communications and Minister for Transport, with 
effect from 27 June 2020: 

(a) Anna Conlan; 

(b) Dónall Geoghegan; 

(c) Éamonn Fahey; 

(d) David Healy; 

(e) Niamh Allen. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [754] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [754] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
